document.full_text: seve ballesteros, one of golf's greatest showmen, was given an emotional send-off by hundreds of mourners at a funeral service in his hometown of pedrena on wednesday.
document.title: ballesteros the revolutionary gets hero's send-off
lines_and_colors: seve ballesteros, one of golf's greatest showmen, was given an emotional send-off by hundreds of mourners at a funeral service in his hometown of pedrena on wednesday.
